comments.en:
It may be necessary to turn the printer off and on when switching resolution (I only tried high resolution once, but I have used 360x180 for years).

This is an old but durable printer, I have used it for 5 years with no problems.

The printer is no longer being sold, but the manual that shipped with it contains full programming documentation of all printer features making it possible to write your own drivers for any OS or application.

Consumables/Refills: Kores Gr. 691 Star LC24-10 approx. $12.50
